revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Petri Galatini opus de Arcanis Catholicæ Veritatis. Hoc est, In omnia difficilia loca Veteris Testamenti, ex Talmud alijs ́Hebraicis libris ... contra Iudæorum..."
revision.text: Possibly: Petri Galatini opus de Arcanis Catholicæ Veritatis. Hoc est, In omnia difficilia loca Veteris Testamenti, ex Talmud alijs ́Hebraicis libris ... contra Iudæorum perfidiam ... Commentarius. Ad hæc Ioannis Reuchlini ... de arte cabalistica libri tres, etc. (Petrus Columna Galatinus). (coll. 776. Sumptibus Jacobi Godofredi Seyler: Francofurti ad Mœnum, 1672). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/558433925
